name: SynapseOS
short_description:
A geek-unlocked build of openSUSE.

+Clean and Full Featured+
SynapseOS contains all the essential applications pre-loaded. Check your email with Evolution, write notes using Tomboy, browse the web with Chromium, manage your photos with Shotwell, everything just works.

+GNOME+
You like eye candy, right? GNOME delivers all that, with smooth animations and flexibility. If your graphics card isn't good enough for GNOME, you can use Classic GNOME with Compiz. A good-looking and stable interface, right at you fingertips.

+Compatibility+
SynapseOS comes with OpenJDK, Flash Player, Mono, Wine, and all other useful plugins for the best user experience we can deliver.

+Drivers Included+
Basic graphics card drivers are included. More to come!

+Open-Source+
We'll give out our Kiwi source code. Download it here!
